item.title: Windows 7 Tablet vs. iPad
item.description: This is a pretty fun comparison of a Windows 7 Hanvon tablet and the iPad. Mute the music and Steve Jobs voice over unless your into that kind of cacophony. Found via 52 Tiger. http://52tiger.net/windows-7-tablet-vs-ipad/?utm_source=feedburner
